Samathavipassanābhūtena nippariyāyena bodhipakkhiye eva gaṇhanto ‘‘aparabhāge’’ti āha. Pariyāyabodhipakkhiyā pana visesato vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanākālepi labbhanti.
